workflows.name: Load Products Data

action_3.code:
// Mock products data - replace with actual Xano endpoint
const mockProducts = [
  {
    id: "prod-001",
    name: "Wireless Headphones",
    variant: "Black",
    sku: "WH-001-BLK",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1505740420928-5e560c06d30e?w=80&h=80&fit=crop",
    hasBOM: true,
    status: "active",
    lastUpdated: "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z"
  },
  {
    id: "prod-002", 
    name: "Smartphone Case",
    variant: "Clear",
    sku: "SC-002-CLR",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556656793-08538906a9f8?w=80&h=80&fit=crop",
    hasBOM: false,
    status: "active",
    lastUpdated: "2024-01-14T15:45:00Z"
  },
  {
    id: "prod-003",
    name: "USB Cable",
    variant: "USB-C",
    sku: "UC-003-C",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1558618666-fcd25c85cd64?w=80&h=80&fit=crop",
    hasBOM: true,
    status: "draft",
    lastUpdated: "2024-01-13T09:20:00Z"
  },
  {
    id: "prod-004",
    name: "Bluetooth Speaker",
    variant: "Portable",
    sku: "BS-004-PRT",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1608043152269-423dbba4e7e1?w=80&h=80&fit=crop",
    hasBOM: true,
    status: "active",
    lastUpdated: "2024-01-12T14:10:00Z"
  },
  {
    id: "prod-005",
    name: "Power Bank",
    variant: "10000mAh",
    sku: "PB-005-10K",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1609592806787-3d9c1b8e5e8e?w=80&h=80&fit=crop",
    hasBOM: false,
    status: "archived",
    lastUpdated: "2024-01-11T11:30:00Z"
  }
];

return mockProducts;
